           <div id="the-basics" class="topic_area"> 
            <h2 class="topic_area_title syndicate">The Basics</h2> 
            <div class="pages"> 
             <div class="page" id="page_205"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">The Basics: <span>Overview</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <p>Not all stress is bad.&nbsp;But chronic (ongoing) stress can lead to health problems.</p>
               <p>Preventing and managing chronic stress can&nbsp;lower your risk for serious conditions like heart disease, obesity, high blood pressure, and depression.</p>
               <p>You can prevent or reduce stress by:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Planning ahead&nbsp;</li>
                <li>Deciding which tasks need to be done first</li>
                <li>Preparing for stressful events</li>
               </ul>
               <p>Some stress is hard to avoid. You can find ways to manage stress by:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Noticing when you feel stressed</li>
                <li>Taking time to relax</li>
                <li>Getting active and eating healthy</li>
                <li>Talking to friends and family</li>
               </ul> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_topic_navigation_0" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNextLabel_0" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNext_0" class="button next" href="#the-basics_2">Signs and Health Effects</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageRange_0" class="content_page_range">1 of 9 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_206"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">The Basics: <span>Signs and Health Effects</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>What are the signs of stress?</h3>
               <p>When people are under stress, they may feel:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Worried</li>
                <li>Angry</li>
                <li>Irritable</li>
                <li>Depressed</li>
                <li>Unable to focus</li>
               </ul>
               <p>Stress also affects your body. Physical signs of stress include:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Headaches</li>
                <li>Back pain</li>
                <li>Problems sleeping</li>
                <li>Upset stomach</li>
                <li>Weight gain or loss</li>
                <li>Tense muscles</li>
                <li>Frequent or more serious colds</li>
               </ul>
               <p>Stress is different for everyone. <a href="http://www.mentalhealthamerica.net/stress-screener" target="_blank">Take this quiz&nbsp;to better understand your stress</a>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_topic_navigation_1" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNextLabel_1" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNext_1" class="button next" href="#the-basics_3">Causes of Stress</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pagePrevLabel_1" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pagePrev_1" class="button previous" href="#the-basics_1">Overview</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageRange_1" class="content_page_range">2 of 9 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_207"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">The Basics: <span>Causes of Stress</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>What causes stress?</h3>
               <p>Change is often a cause of stress. Even positive changes, like having a baby or getting a job promotion, can be stressful.</p>
               <p>Stress can be short-term or long-term.</p>
               <h4>Common causes of short-term stress:</h4>
               <ul>
                <li>Needing to do a lot in a short amount of time</li>
                <li>Experiencing many small problems in the same day, like a traffic jam or running late</li>
                <li>Getting lost</li>
                <li>Having an argument</li>
               </ul>
               <h4>Common causes of long-term stress:</h4>
               <ul>
                <li>Problems at work or at home</li>
                <li>Money problems</li>
                <li>Caring for someone with a serious illness</li>
                <li>Chronic (ongoing) illness</li>
                <li>Death of a loved one</li>
               </ul> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_topic_navigation_2" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNextLabel_2" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNext_2" class="button next" href="#the-basics_4">Benefits of Lower Stress</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pagePrevLabel_2" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pagePrev_2" class="button previous" href="#the-basics_2">Signs and Health Effects</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageRange_2" class="content_page_range">3 of 9 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_418"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">The Basics: <span>Benefits of Lower Stress</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>What are the benefits of managing stress?</h3>
               <p>Over time, chronic stress can lead to health problems. Managing stress can help you:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Sleep better</li>
                <li>Control your weight</li>
                <li>Get sick less often</li>
                <li>Feel better faster when you do get&nbsp;sick</li>
                <li>Have less neck and back pain</li>
                <li>Be in a better mood</li>
                <li>Get along better with family and friends</li>
               </ul> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_topic_navigation_3" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNextLabel_3" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNext_3" class="button next" href="#take-action_1">Plan and Prepare</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pagePrevLabel_3" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pagePrev_3" class="button previous" href="#the-basics_3">Causes of Stress</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageRange_3" class="content_page_range">4 of 9 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <div class="clear"></div> 
           </div> 
           <div id="take-action" class="topic_area"> 
            <h2 class="topic_area_title syndicate">Take Action!</h2> 
            <div class="pages"> 
             <div class="page" id="page_209"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">Take Action: <span>Plan and Prepare</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <p>You can’t always avoid stress, but you can take steps to deal with your stress in a positive way. Follow these 9 tips for preventing and managing stress.</p>
               <p>Being prepared and feeling in control of your situation might help lower your stress.</p>
               <h3>1. Plan your time.</h3>
               <p>Think ahead about how you are going to use your time. Write a to-do list and figure out what’s most important – then do that thing first. Be realistic about how long each task will take.</p>
               <h3>2. Prepare yourself.</h3>
               <p>Prepare ahead of time for stressful events like a job interview or a hard conversation with a loved one.</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Stay positive.</li>
                <li>Picture what the room will look like and what you will say.</li>
                <li>Have a back-up plan.</li>
               </ul> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_topic_navigation_0" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNextLabel_0" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNext_0" class="button next" href="#take-action_2">Relax</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrevLabel_0" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrev_0" class="button previous" href="#the-basics_4">Benefits of Lower Stress</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageRange_0" class="content_page_range">5 of 9 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_210"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">Take Action: <span>Relax</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>3. Relax with deep breathing or meditation.</h3>
               <p>Deep breathing and meditation are 2 ways to relax your muscles and clear your&nbsp;mind.</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Find out how easy it is to <a href="http://www.helpguide.org/articles/stress/relaxation-techniques-for-stress-relief.htm#breathing">use deep breathing to relax</a>.</li>
                <li><a href="https://www.mayoclinic.org/tests-procedures/meditation/in-depth/meditation/art-20045858?p=1">Try meditating for a few minutes today</a>.</li>
               </ul>
               <h3>4. Relax your muscles.</h3>
               <p>Stress causes tension in your muscles. Try stretching or taking a hot shower to help you relax.<a href="https://www.ors.od.nih.gov/sr/dohs/HealthAndWellness/Ergonomics/Pages/exercises.aspx#Musculoskeletal"> Check out these stretches you can do.</a></p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_topic_navigation_1" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNextLabel_1" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNext_1" class="button next" href="#take-action_3">Get Active</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrevLabel_1" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrev_1" class="button previous" href="#take-action_1">Plan and Prepare</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageRange_1" class="content_page_range">6 of 9 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_916"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">Take Action: <span>Get Active</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>5. Get active.</h3>
               <p><a href="http://www.mayoclinic.org/healthy-living/stress-management/in-depth/exercise-and-stress/art-20044469?p=1">Regular physical activity can help prevent and manage stress</a>. It can also help relax your muscles and improve your mood.</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Aim for 2 hours and 30 minutes a week of physical activity. Try going for a bike ride or taking a walk.</li>
                <li>Be sure to exercise for at least 10 minutes at a time.</li>
                <li>Do strengthening activities – like crunches or lifting weights – at least 2 days a&nbsp;week.</li>
               </ul>
               <p><a href="https://healthfinder.gov/HealthTopics/Category/health-conditions-and-diseases/diabetes/get-active">Find out more about getting active.</a></p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_topic_navigation_2" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNextLabel_2" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNext_2" class="button next" href="#take-action_4">Food and Alcohol</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrevLabel_2" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrev_2" class="button previous" href="#take-action_2">Relax</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageRange_2" class="content_page_range">7 of 9 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_248"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">Take Action: <span>Food and Alcohol</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>6. Eat healthy.</h3>
               <p>Give your body plenty of energy by <a href="/HealthTopics/Topic.aspx?id=21">eating healthy</a> – including vegetables, fruits, and lean sources of protein.</p>
               <h3>7. Drink alcohol only in moderation.</h3>
               <p>Avoid using alcohol or other drugs to manage&nbsp;stress. If you choose to drink, <a href="/HealthTopics/Topic.aspx?id=16">drink only in moderation</a>. This means no more than 1 drink a day for women and no more than 2 drinks a day for men.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_topic_navigation_3" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNextLabel_3" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNext_3" class="button next" href="#take-action_5">Get Support</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrevLabel_3" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrev_3" class="button previous" href="#take-action_3">Get Active</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageRange_3" class="content_page_range">8 of 9 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_559"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">Take Action: <span>Get Support</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>8. Talk to friends and family.</h3>
               <p>Tell your friends and family if you are feeling stressed. They may be able to help. <a href="http://www.mayoclinic.org/healthy-living/stress-management/in-depth/social-support/art-20044445?pg=1&amp;p=1" target="_blank">Learn how&nbsp;friends and family can help you feel less stressed</a>.</p>
               <h3>9. Get help if you need it.</h3>
               <p>Stress is a normal part of life. But if your stress doesn’t go away or keeps getting worse, you may need help. Over time, stress can lead to serious problems like depression or&nbsp;anxiety.</p>
               <ul>
                <li>If you are feeling down or hopeless, <a href="/HealthTopics/Topic.aspx?id=33">talk to a doctor about depression</a>.</li>
                <li>If you are feeling anxious, <a href="https://www.nimh.nih.gov/health/topics/anxiety-disorders/index.shtml#part_145338" target="_blank">find out how to get help for anxiety</a>.</li>
                <li>If you have lived through an unsafe event,&nbsp;<a href="https://www.nimh.nih.gov/health/topics/post-traumatic-stress-disorder-ptsd/index.shtml#part_145375">find out about treatment for PTSD (post-traumatic stress disorder)</a>.</li>
               </ul>
               <p>A mental health professional (like a psychologist or social worker) can help treat these conditions with talk therapy (called psychotherapy) or medicine. <a href="http://www.nimh.nih.gov/health/topics/psychotherapies/index.shtml" target="_blank">Learn more about talk therapy</a>.</p>
               <p>Lots of people need help dealing with stress – it’s nothing to be ashamed of!</p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_topic_navigation_4" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrevLabel_4" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrev_4" class="button previous" href="#take-action_4">Food and Alcohol</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageRange_4" class="content_page_range">9 of 9 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div>
